H0.text: Identifying genetic disorders has been made easier by the development of DNA technology over the last twenty years.

H1.text: Determining the parts of an atom has been made easier by the development of DNA technology, which has improved greatly in the last twenty years.

H2.text: Observing distant objects in space has been made easier by the development of DNA technology over the last twenty years.

H3.text: Making very accurate measurements has been made easier by the development of DNA technology over the last twenty years.

A4.text: Comparing healthy and mutated DNA sequences can diagnose different diseases including various cancers, characterize antibody repertoire, and can be used to guide patient treatment.

A5.text: The rapid advancements in DNA sequencing technology have played a crucial role in sequencing complete genomes of humans, as well as numerous animal, plant, and microbial species.
